text:
[Verse]
Sun is rising up so high
Light is sparkling in my eye
Grab a cup and say goodbye
To the sleepy night sky

[Verse 2]
Birds are chirping everywhere
Feel the cool and crisp fresh air
Morning glow without a care
In this golden time we share

[Chorus]
Morning sunrise fills the day
Chasing all the dark away
Colors blend and skies will play
With each golden ray

[Verse 3]
Trees are bathed in shades of green
In this dreamlike morning scene
Every moment feels so keen
With the world fresh and clean

[Bridge]
Dewdrops glisten on the grass
Moments like this never pass
Hold onto them make them last
In this present spell we're cast

[Chorus]
Morning sunrise fills the day
Chasing all the dark away
Colors blend and skies will play
With each golden ray
title: Morning Sunrise
